summary: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.
cast: Nirup Bhandari|Radhika Narayan|Avantika Shetty|Sai Kumar|Anantha Velu|Aravind Rao|Siddu Moolimani|Karthik Rao Kordale|Shankar Ashwath|Srinath Vasista|Chethan Raj|Roshni Kore|Swapna Raj|Renuka|Shilpa Singh|Patla Sathish Shetty
title: RangiTaranga
